name: Engine Oil
description: Motorcycle-specific engine oil; mineral, semi-synthetic, or full synthetic. Must meet manufacturer spec (e.g. JASO MA/MA2).

name: Oil Filter
description: Spin-on or cartridge oil filter element.

name: Oil Filter O-Rings / Seals
description: Replacement O-rings or seals for oil filter housing or oil passages.

name: Drain Plug
description: Engine oil drain plug.

name: Drain Plug Washer
description: Crush washer or sealing washer for engine oil drain plug.

name: Air Filter
description: Paper, foam, or performance air filter element.

name: Air Filter Oil
description: Special oil for foam air filters (off-road and older motorcycles).

name: Fuel
description: Petrol used for testing, tuning, and post-service checks.

name: Fuel Filter
description: Inline or in-tank fuel filter.

name: Fuel Injector Cleaner
description: Cleaner additive for fuel-injected motorcycles.

name: Carburetor Cleaner
description: Solvent cleaner for carburetors and throttle bodies.

name: Carburetor / Throttle Body Synchronization Fluid
description: Mercury-free manometer fluid or tools for carb/EFI sync.

name: Spark Plugs
description: Correct heat range and type spark plugs; gap per specification.

name: Spark Plug Caps / NGK Resistor Caps
description: Replacement spark plug terminal caps with resistor.

name: Battery
description: 12V motorcycle battery; lead-acid, AGM, gel, or lithium.

name: Coolant
description: Ethylene glycol or motorcycle-specific coolant for water-cooled engines.

name: Coolant Additive / Corrosion Inhibitor
description: Additive to protect cooling system components and improve heat transfer.

name: Brake Fluid
description: DOT 3, DOT 4, or DOT 5.1 brake fluid for brake and hydraulic clutch systems.

name: Brake Cleaner
description: Solvent cleaner for brake discs, calipers, and pads.

name: Brake Pads
description: Front and rear brake pads; organic, sintered, or ceramic compound.

name: Brake Discs / Rotors
description: Replacement front and/or rear brake discs/rotors.

name: Brake Caliper Seals / Rebuild Kits
description: Seal and piston kits for rebuilding brake calipers.

name: Brake Master Cylinder Rebuild Kits
description: Seal and diaphragm kits for rebuilding brake master cylinders.

name: Clutch Fluid
description: Hydraulic clutch fluid; usually DOT brake fluid or mineral oil depending on system.

name: Clutch Plates
description: Friction and steel drive plates for wet or dry clutches.

name: Clutch Springs
description: Clutch pressure plate springs; standard or heavy-duty.

name: Fork Oil
description: Suspension fork oil of specified viscosity (e.g. 5W, 10W).

name: Fork Seals
description: Oil and dust seals for front suspension forks.

name: Shock Absorber Oil
description: Oil used in serviceable rear shock absorbers.

name: Steering Head Bearings
description: Tapered roller or ball bearing sets for the steering stem.

name: Wheel Bearings
description: Sealed ball or roller bearings for front and rear wheels.

name: Swingarm Pivot Bearings / Bushings
description: Needle bearings or bushings for the rear swingarm pivot.

name: Chain Lubricant
description: Lubricant for O-ring, X-ring, or standard drive chains.

name: Chain Cleaner
description: Cleaner for removing dirt and old lubricant from chains.

name: Chain Wax / Spray Lube
description: Alternative to standard chain lube; often less fling-off.

name: Drive Chain
description: Replacement final drive chain.

name: Master Link
description: Riveted or clip-type master link for drive chains.

name: Sprockets
description: Front and rear drive sprockets.

name: Belt Drive
description: Replacement final drive belt for belt-driven motorcycles.

name: Drive Shaft Fluid
description: Hypoid gear oil for shaft drive final drive units.

name: Tyres/Tires
description: Front and rear motorcycle tyres; correct size and rating.

name: Inner Tubes
description: Inner tubes for tube-type wheels.

name: Wheel Weights
description: Adhesive or clip-on weights for wheel balancing.

name: Cables (Throttle / Clutch / Choke)
description: Control cables for throttle, clutch, or choke.

name: Cable Lubricant
description: Lubricant for throttle, clutch, and control cables.

name: Gaskets
description: Engine, exhaust, rocker cover, or side cover gaskets.

name: Sealant / Gasket Maker
description: Liquid gasket or RTV sealant for engine assembly.

name: Exhaust Packing
description: Fiberglass or equivalent packing material for silencers.

name: Grease
description: Multi-purpose or lithium grease for bearings and pivots.

name: Anti-Seize Compound
description: Compound to prevent fastener seizure, commonly used on exhaust bolts and spark plugs.

name: Threadlocker
description: Medium or high strength thread locking compound.

name: Electrical Contact Cleaner
description: Cleaner for electrical connectors and switches.

name: Fuses
description: Blade-type or other standard fuses of various amperages.

name: Relays
description: Standard automotive/motorcycle relays (e.g., for headlights, fuel pump).

name: Dielectric Grease
description: Silicone grease for waterproofing and protecting electrical connectors.

name: Battery Terminal Cleaner / Protector
description: Wire brush and anti-corrosion gel for battery terminals.

name: Bulbs / LEDs
description: Headlight, indicator, tail light, and instrument bulbs or LED replacements.

name: Helmet Visor Cleaner / Anti-Fog
description: Spray or liquid for cleaning and preventing fog on helmet visors.

name: Motorcycle Wash / Degreaser
description: pH-balanced cleaner specifically for motorcycle surfaces.

name: Spray Cleaner & Polish
description: All-in-one cleaner, polish, and protectant for paint, plastic, and metal.

name: Paint Touch-Up Pen
description: Small paint applicator for repairing chips and scratches.

name: Shop Towels / Rags
description: Lint-free shop towels for general cleaning and fluid absorption.

name: Hand Cleaner
description: Mechanics' hand cleaner (with or without pumice).

name: Valve Shim
description: Hardened steel disc used to adjust valve clearance in shim-under-bucket or shim-over-bucket valve trains. Measured in precise thickness increments (e.g., 0.05mm steps).
